titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Select Committee on the Strategic Competition Between the United States and the Chinese Communist Party.
Providing amounts for the expenses of the Select Committee on the Strategic Competition Between the United States and the Chinese Communist Party.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Mr. Steil asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution provides amounts for the expenses of the House Select Committee on the Strategic Competition between the United States and the Chinese Communist Party for the 118th Congress.
